sentences.sentence: His solution was to learn something from the rebels it was fighting: decentralising authority to self-organising teams.
sentences.translation: 他的解决方案是，向正在与之战斗的叛军学习：把权力下放给自发组织的军队。

sentences.sentence: The teaching method of decentralising it and gradually deepening it introduced in this article is practical.
sentences.translation: 文中介绍的“分散讲授，逐步深化”的教学方法是切实可行的。
